name: Michael Baxter
text: Friendly staff and good service.  Food was good and affordably priced for being in a good court at a tourist trap destination spot.

name: Ed Prendergast
text: Worse pizza I've  experienced. They added water to sauce with much garlic salt for taste. Thin watery  stained sauce leaked out when you held pizza up to place it in your mouth. You really  need to check on that sight. Thank you.

name: Zona Man
text: It taste like a pancake with sauce cheese and toppings on it. It was so bad. The service was extremely terrible. The older lady did not care at all and I think she is the manager. It cost almost $10 for 1 slice 1 piece of garlic bread and a drink. Definitely not worth it.

name: John Phillips
text: Horrible experience, most of the food was not even made for sale and the rest that was available was cold. Sodas are flat The environment surrounding the restaurant is lonely and depending. The employees act like they do not even want to ‚Ä¶More

text: Friendly service, good food, awesome store all togetherüëç

name: Angie
text: This is not the sbarro I know and use to love. The crust was disgusting

name: Belinda Mathias
text: Helpful and friendly staff. Especially buying fish.
